options.text: Enrollments are used to track user progress on a specific course. Create new enrollments via the API when users sign up for a course and create new items in the `lms_enrollments_lessons_completed` collection whenever they complete a lesson.

options.text: Build dynamic pages quickly using ready-made blocks. See our documentation to learn more about the Page Builder.

options.text: Form submissions are configured to be read-only for data integrity reasons. But they are a great candidate for use in [Flows](/admin/settings/flows). Directus Flows is a drag and drop, low-code automation builder to simplify tasks like automatic notifications or sending incoming requests to third party services. Learn more about Flows.
